Package com.mygdx.game.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatView
    BatView is a class that contains the animations of the bat, and the methods to update them.
    BubbleView
    BubbleView is a class that contains the animation of the bubble enemy.
    BulletBarView
    BulletBarView is a class that deals with the textures of the bullet bar.
    BulletView
    BulletView is a class that contains the texture of the bullet and deals with the view of it.
    ElementView
    ElementView is a class that deals with the view of each element, containing its sprite and animation and methods to update them.
    EnemyView
    EnemyView is a class that deals with the view of each of the enemy entities, containing methods to update their view.
    GameView
    GameView is a class that deals with the visualization of every element of the game, having methods to update the view of the game, including its viewport and camera, and also drawing the elements.
    HealthBarView
    HealthBarView is a class that deals with the view of the health points of the hero.
    HeroState  
    HeroStateJumping
    HeroStateJumping is a class that deals with the sprite of the hero when an action has been performed for it to jump.
    HeroStateRolling
    HeroStateRolling is a class that deals with the animations of the hero when an action has been performed for it to roll.
    HeroStateStanding
    HeroStateStanding is a class that deals with the animations of the hero when an action has been performed for it to stand.
    HeroStateWalking
    HeroStateWalking is a class that deals with the animations of the hero when an action has been performed for it to walk.
    HeroView
    HeroView is a class that deals with all the animations of the hero, checking its status to choose which of the animations to use.
    LevelView
    LevelView is a class that contains the view of level label, that is, at the beginning of each level, a label will be displayed with the current level of the game.
    MainMenuScreen
    MainMenuScreen is a class that deals with the view of the main menu screen, dealing with the input in it, the images displayed in it and the launching of the game if the PLAY option is chose, or the exit of the game if that option is chose.
    MapTileView
    MapTileView is a class that deals with the view of a tile, identifying its type and choosing a texture according to it.
    ResultsScreen  
    SnailView
    SnailView is a class that deals with the view of the snail, including the flips regarding the change in direction and its sprite.
    StatusElementsView
    StatusElementsView is a class that contains the stage, image, viewport and camera regarding elements adjacent to the game, that is, the healthBar and the bulletBar.
    ViewFactory
    ViewFactory is a implementation of the Factory Design Pattern, returning a view according to the type of element given.
